p: HIV infection is a serious immunodeficiency caused by HIV infection, through qualitative and quantitative deficiency of the T helper lymphocytes, which have the CD4+ surface receptor, target of HIV. 1 The ophthalmologic changes associated with HIV are related to TCD4+ counts, if the count is <100 cells/mm 3, it will allow for retinal diseases such as retinitis and retinal microangiopathy. 1
